snippet: A survey by the Federal Reserve suggested that the economy performed better in March than had been indicated by some government data on hiring and consumer spending.
abstract: Roundup of regional economic conditions in Federal Reserve's 12 banking districts finds economy continued to grow modestly in late February and March; strengthening housing recovery and robust auto sales contributed to growth.
lead_paragraph: A survey by the Federal Reserve suggested that the economy performed better in March than had been indicated by some government data on hiring and consumer spending.

headline.main: Housing and Auto Sales Lifted Economy, Fed Says
headline.print_headline: Housing and Auto Sales Lifted Economy, Fed Says
